npc.speach: Thud! A shadowy figure leaps through the door and lands on top of you. It gets to its feet so quickly, you scarcely have time to draw your sword.
There is no need for that. I have no interest in quarrelling with you.
I suppose I could ask the same to you. If I'm not mistaken, this palce is forbidden to disgraced bodyguards and decrepit old men as well.
Her words are as sharp as daggers.
Listen, we don’t have much time left. Any minute now, the guards will find us unless we leave now.

npc.name: Xander
npc.speach: As much as I don’t trust you, it would be foolish to betray each other now.
The trio sneak around the Keeper’s Manor until they find the exit.

npc.name: Llewellyn
npc.speach: There’s something I must do before I go.
The downtrodden look in his eyes tells you everything you need to know.
